sentence: Why do skateboarders make lousy plumbers? because they only use half pipes.
explanation: A tube through which fluids can flow.
first_new_sentence: The plumber used a pipe to fix the leak in the bathroom.
second_new_sentence: The sound of a pipe echoed through the hall as the music began.

sentence: What do you call a man with no arms and no legs in a pile of leaves? rustle.
explanation: The sound of leaves when they are moved.
first_new_sentence: The wind made a rustle in the trees.
second_new_sentence: The rustle of the leaves signaled the arrival of autumn.
